settings.editor:
• NoirUnited is looking for a volunteer to assist with managing and creating social media posts and maintaining brand identity and social presence. 

  • Background knowledge of Adobe Creative cloud suite and Canva is preferred.

• NoirUnited is looking for a volunteer to assist with the development of media-related content. 
  • Tentative responsibilities include writing articles, newsletters, press releases, etc. 
  • Strong writing skills are preferred. 
  •

• NoirUnited is looking for a volunteer to assist with administrative support.

  • Tentative responsibilities include handling logistics and organizational tasks, drafting emails, scheduling meetings, etc

• NoirUnited is looking for a volunteer to assist with research on issues related to program development, policy initiatives, and the Black diaspora.

  • Responsibilities include: conducting research, writing reports, and presenting findings. 

  • Background knowledge of qualitative and quantitative data collection and analysis preferred.
To apply, please send cover letter and
